column4: hey, how do i put a partition on my drive, i used the entire thing to install ubuntu, and i want to use some left overs to make a partition
You can boot from a CD/USB key with gparted live installed, and make the changes with that.
does the ubnutu cd have it? or do i have to do it myself?
I believe you can use the ubuntu CD, but I've never personally gone that route.  Easiest for me is just to use a gparted live CD.
